summary.para: Contains functionality related to the ReSharperReports tool.

In order to use the commands for this addin, you will need to include the following in your build.cake file to download and reference from NuGet.org:
#tool ReSharperReports
In addition, you will need to include the following:
#addin Cake.ReSharperReports

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsAliases.ReSharperReports(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Runs ReSharperReports against the specified input FilePath, and outputs to specified output FilePath

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsAliases.ReSharperReports(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsSettings)
member.summary: Runs ReSharperReports against the specified input FilePath, and outputs to specified output FilePath with the specified ReSharperReportsSettings

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsRunner.#ctor(Cake.Core.IO.IFileSystem,Cake.Core.ICakeEnvironment,Cake.Core.IO.IProcessRunner,Cake.Core.Tooling.IToolLocator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsRunner.Run(Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsSettings)
member.summary: Transform the input XML file using either default XSL file, or one passed in via Settings.

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsRunner.GetToolName
member.summary: Gets the name of the tool.

member.name: M:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsRunner.GetToolExecutableNames
member.summary: Gets the name of the tool executable.

member.name: P:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsSettings.XslFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the XSL Transform File path.

member.name: P:Cake.ReSharperReports.ReSharperReportsSettings.LogFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the log file path.
